org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.driver.mxml.vf2js

Class MXMLVF2JSSWCBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.driver.js.JSBackend
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.driver.mxml.MXMLBackend
        • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.driver.mxml.vf2js.MXMLVF2JSSWCBackend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBackend, IJSBackend

    public class MXMLVF2JSSWCBackend
extends MXMLBackend
    A concrete implementation of the IBackend API where the MXMLBlockWalker is used to traverse the IMXMLFileNode AST.
    Author:
    Erik de Bruin

      • createMXMLWalker

        public IMXMLBlockWalker createMXMLWalker(IASProject project,
                                List<ICompilerProblem> errors,
                                IMXMLEmitter mxmlEmitter,
                                IASEmitter asEmitter,
                                IBlockWalker asBlockWalker)
        Description copied from interface: IBackend
        Creates an AST walker capable of traversing MXML AST and calling back to the IASBlockWalker for ActionScript source code production.

        Use the #createWalker(IASProject, List, ASFilterWriter) method first and pass that instance into this method's walker parameter.

        Specified by:
        createMXMLWalker in interface IBackend
        Overrides:
        createMXMLWalker in class MXMLBackend
        Parameters:
        project - The current IASProject.
        errors - The current ICompilerProblem list.

        public JSTarget createTarget(IASProject project,
                    ITargetSettings settings,
                    ITargetProgressMonitor monitor)
        Description copied from interface: IBackend

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        project - The current ICompilerProject.
        settings - The target's custom settings.
